rows.label: qst202205_0010
rows.name:
Raiko!
We finally caught up with you.

rows.label: qst202205_0020
rows.name:
Please, don't come near me, okay?
I can't control my own power.

rows.label: qst202205_0030
rows.name: I can't help it, I just end up zapping everyone...

rows.label: qst202205_0040
rows.name: That's as may be, but don't worry about it.

rows.label: qst202205_0050
rows.name: Your power is a massive help to us!

rows.label: qst202205_0060
rows.name:
He's right.
It certainly doesn't matter to me.

rows.label: qst202205_0070
rows.name: R-really?

rows.label: qst202205_0080
rows.name: No word of a lie, kid.

rows.label: qst202205_0090
rows.name:
You still have much growing to do.
Perhaps a little training is in order?

rows.label: qst202205_0100
rows.name: Training?

rows.label: qst202205_0110
rows.name: That good idea.

rows.label: qst202205_0120
rows.name:
You must connect with your powers and,
in doing so, learn how to better control them.

rows.label: qst202205_0130
rows.name:
And then...you won't accidentally
shock people anymore!

rows.label: qst202205_0140
rows.name: You won't hurt anyone ever again.

rows.label: qst202205_0150
rows.name: No more random shocks...especially not for me!

rows.label: qst202205_0160
rows.name:
Wow...
Maybe you're right!

rows.label: qst202205_0170
rows.name:
Thanks for the advice, everyone!
Thank you very much!

rows.label: qst202205_0180
rows.name:
I'm going to train as hard as I can!
I'll get this power under control, you'll see!

rows.label: qst202205_0190
rows.name: I owe you guys big-time!

rows.label: qst202205_0200
rows.name: Argh, stoppit!
